info.description: APIs to handle Basic Data (i.e. Instrumens, Funds, Portfolios, Prices, Key Figures, etc.)
info.title: Basic Data API

tags.name: Funds
tags.description: Responsible for handling Fund Basic Data

tags.name: Instruments
tags.description: Responsible for handling Instrument Basic Data

tags.name: Market data
tags.description: Responsible for handling market data as Prices, FX and other Key Figures

tags.name: Stock Exchanges
tags.description: Responsible for handling Stock Exchange Basic Data

get.description: Reads all funds and streams it with the desired flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Fund flexible fields codes to fetch

parameters.name: partnerFlexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Partner flexible fields codes to fetch

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Fund flexible fields codes to fetch

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of Fund to fetch

parameters.name: partnerFlexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Partner flexible fields codes to fetch

get.description: Reads all instruments and streams it with the desired flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Instrument flexible fields codes to fetch

parameters.name: stockExchangeFlexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Stock Exchange flexible fields codes to fetch

get.description: Counts the number of active instruments
Reads an Instrument with the desired flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Instrument flexible fields codes to fetch

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of Instrument to fetch

parameters.name: stockExchangeFlexibleFields
parameters.description: List of Stock Exchange flexible fields codes to fetch

post.description: Endpoint that allows to trigger an asynchronous import of FX prices

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation identifier header

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: Optional request identifier header

parameters.name: theFxPrices
parameters.description: List of FX prices to import

200.description: The import is ready and will be processed by Xentis

post.description: Endpoint that allows to trigger an asynchronous import of Key Figures

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation identifier header

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: Optional request identifier header

parameters.name: theKeyFigures
parameters.description: List of Key Figures to import

200.description: The import is ready and will be processed by Xentis

post.description: Endpoint that allows to trigger an asynchronous import of prices

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: Optional correlation identifier header

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: Optional request identifier header

parameters.name: prices
parameters.description: List of prices to import

200.description: The import is ready and will be processed by Xentis

get.description: Get a list of all brokers with the provided flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: optional collection of flexible fields to fetch

get.description: Get all brokers mapped by fund with the provided flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: optional collection of flexible fields to fetch

get.summary: Get all brokers of a Fund
get.description: Get all brokers related to a fund with the provided flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: optional collection of flexible fields to fetch

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of fund to fetch the related brokers

get.description: Get all brokers mapped by portfolio with the provided flexible fields

parameters.name: flexibleFields
parameters.description: optional collection of flexible fields to fetch

parameters.name: id

get.summary: Get related IDs mapped by parent ID
get.description: Get all relations of a given type, possibly bounded on an ID interval

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The End Range of parent values to fetch

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The Start Range of parent values to fetch

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The System Relation type that we are trying to fetch

parameters.name: id

get.description: Gets all the translations of the specified types and returns a maps of Xentis IDs to a resolved multi-language translations

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Types of translations to get

get.description: Bulk returns a set of translations and returns a maps of Xentis IDs to a resolved multi-language translations

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Ids of translations to fetch

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Types of translations to get

get.summary: Get all translations in a range
get.description: Gets all the translations within a specific range and returns a maps of Xentis IDs to a resolved multi-language translations

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Sample Id within the provided range to fetch

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Type of Xentis IDs Range to fetch translations for

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Types of translations to get

AssetText.title: AssetText
AssetText.description: A name for a given instrument

Depot.title: Depot
Depot.description: A reference to the Portfolio position which represents it's deposit

FXSeries.title: FXSeries
FXSeries.description: Defines a time series of Forex prices

FlexibleFieldValue.title: FlexibleFieldValue
FlexibleFieldValue.description: A value of a Flexible Field. It either is a simple value on the info field, or a descritor to other Xentis entity on the id field

HexId.title: HexId
HexId.description: A Xentis internal ID in hexadecimal format

InstrumentForStockExchange.title: InstrumentForStockExchange
InstrumentForStockExchange.description: An instrument traded at a Stock Exchange. Some flexible fields are specific to this relation

KeyFigureSeries.title: KeyFigureSeries
KeyFigureSeries.description: Defines a time series of Keyfigure values

Partner.title: Partner
Partner.description: A Xentis Partner. Depending on usage it can represent either Brokers, Order Desks or other kind of Partners

PriceSeries.title: PriceSeries
PriceSeries.description: Defines a time series of stock market prices

StockExchangeForInstrument.title: StockExchangeForInstrument
StockExchangeForInstrument.description: A Stock Exchange where an Instrument is traded. Some flexible fields are specific to this relation
